data.text: @radleybalko We are rapidly approaching a 1,000,000 death toll on a disease for which 95%+ of deaths could be prevented with vaccination, but sure, vaccinations are anti-science because... nope I can't even come up with a snarky answer.
@dillinger501 @radleybalko Have we settled if the earth is flat? We never had to settle it because it isn’t a question anyone who isn’t gullible has ever asked.
@radleybalko I know the casualty figures from Ukraine are incredibly imprecise, but it sounds like we’re losing more each day to COVID than both sides together in an all-out war.
@radleybalko Did we ever settle if all of these were “with COVID” or “from COVID” because you’d think we’d know that by now?
@radleybalko @pamelasm if a cruise ship sank every day with complete loss of life, it seems like we'd be doing something about it.
@FutbolPete717 @radleybalko That is why he is known as Shit Stain
@radleybalko These people need to see corpses lining the streets before they will believe it.  Numbers are abstract and these are not bright people.
